summary: Adds a standalone quiver styled to include features of an adventurer.
descriptionHtml:
I was never pleased with just having a quiver on my back, and armed for the teeth was too much of a hassle. So, this mod adds a bunch of stuff to your back whilst the quiver is equipped, akin to mods that are travel packs. 

-Craftable arrows
-Nord quiver, but shoots steel arrows
-Ebony damage rating

Apologies on the images, I just wanted to call this one finished. 

I was far to lazy to retexture these items myself, however: this mod will take any of the textures you\'ve applied to anything you see on the quiver, as they rely on the vanilla textures. 


Enjoy lookin\' even more badass.
author: Swamrim
